biography:
​From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia.  

Larry Bagby (born March 7, 1974) is an American actor and a musician.
Bagby was born Lawrence Bagby III in Marysville, California. His father was a member of a dance band. Bagby's most notable roles include:
Frank Ellis, Young and the Restless, 2008
Adam Pendon, Believe The Movie, 2007
Marshall Grant (upright bass player), Walk the Line, 2005
Pvt. Shirley "Hickey" Kendrick, Saints and Soldiers, 2003
Larry Blaisdell, Buffy the Vampire Slayer, 1997-1999
	Bagby has also had featured appearances on television shows including CSI: Crime Scene Investigation, Cold Case, Malcolm in the Middle and JAG. As a child, he acted in Airborne and Hocus Pocus.
